exec hapm --manifest hapm.yaml --storage .hapm init
exec hapm --manifest hapm.yaml --storage .hapm --dry install --type integrations foo/bar@v1.0.0
stdout 'Integrations:'
stdout '\+ bar'

exec hapm --manifest hapm.yaml --storage .hapm --dry install foo/new@v1.0.0
stdout '--type parameter is not specified'
